content: **knitted jumper in drops karisma the piece is worked top down with round yoke and nordic pattern sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern u-958 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 500-550-650-700-750-850 g colour 77 light oak 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 01 off white 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 16 dark grey 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 21 medium grey 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 56 dark brown **needles** drops circular needles size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needles size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
